title: Efficient Merge Sort Algorithm Implementation
description: Merge sort is a popular sorting algorithm that uses the divide-and-conquer approach to sort an array. It is a stable, comparison-based algorithm that has a time complexity of O(n log n).

meta.title: Merge Sort Algorithm | Python Sorting Techniques
meta.description: Learn the efficient Merge Sort algorithm in Python. Understand the divide-and-conquer approach, time complexity, and practical examples for sorting arrays of integers and strings.
